item.title: Lady Gaga, BLACKPINK - Sour Candy (with BLACKPINK)
item.description:

I’m sour candy so sweet
Then I get a little angry yeah
Sour candy yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
I’m super psycho
Make you crazy when I turn the lights low
